title: Catalogue Illustration, "Jackson" Sideboard, 1900–05
medium: Black and white photographic process on white paper
inscribed: Imprinted below, center: JACKSON / Plate XL; lower left corner: [coat of arms with rampant lion] / Pottier & Stymus Co. / INTERIOR DECORATIONS / LEXINGTON Ave. and 41st Street / New York City / Established 1857
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Oblong sideboard with convex center front drawer, 2 doors underneath; above top of sideboard, on either side, a cabinet raised on 3 turned and fluted animal paw feet and topped by drawer and a vase; molded backsplash.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Catalogue Illustration, "Jackson" Sideboard, 1900–05. Black and white photographic process on white paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-59
